details:
adjective
- not initiated
= synonyms: uninitiate
- lacking information or instruction
= synonyms: unenlightened
- inexperienced
- of or created by one without formal training
= example: of or created by one without formal training
= synonyms: primitive
- marked by or showing unaffected simplicity and lack of guile or worldly experience
= example: marked by or showing unaffected simplicity and lack of guile or worldly experience
= synonyms: naif
